title: Sajjad Qureshi, former DN APP passes away
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 7 (APP): Sajjad Ali Qureshi, former director news at the Associated Press of Pakistan (APP) passed away here on Saturday after a protracted illness. He was 82.
He was the younger brother of Safdar Ali Qureshi (late), former director general of APP.
Qureshiâ€™s burial will be held on Sunday after Zohar prayers. His funderal will be proceed from his house; 422, street 12, F-10/2, Islamabad.
